# <a name="code-point-at-build-statushttpstravis-ciorgsindresorhuscode-point-at"></a>code-point-at [![ãƒ“ãƒ«ãƒ‰ã®çŠ¶æ³](https://travis-ci.org/sindresorhus/code-point-at.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/sindresorhus/code-point-at)

> ES2015 [`String#codePointAt()`](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String/codePointAt) [ponyfill](https://ponyfill.com)


## <a name="install"></a>[ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ¼ãƒ«]

```
$ npm install --save code-point-at
```


## <a name="usage"></a>ä½¿ç”¨

```js
var codePointAt = require('code-point-at');

codePointAt('ðŸ´');
//=> 128052

codePointAt('abc', 2);
//=> 99
```

## <a name="api"></a>API
